thread.title: Highly recommended !
thread.title_full: Highly recommended ! - Review of The Montcalm London Marble Arch, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Paolo08-74
title: Highly recommended !
text: We spent one week at the Montcalm Marble Arch. The hotel is in a great location very close to Oxford street, the shopping area and Marylebone. The staff is very professional and super helpful. They have addressed very quickly every request in a very friendly yet efficient way. We will definitely go back . I would highly recommend The Montcalm !
